signup.title: Sign up
signup.resident-USA-text: I certify that I am not a resident or a citizen of the USA

signup-email-pending.text-section: Please check your inbox for a confirmation email. Click the link in the email to confirm your email.

two-factor.title: Two-factor authentication
two-factor.recovery-info: Donâ€™t have access to the device?
two-factor.text: Open the two-factor authentication app on your device to view your authentication code and verify your identity.

recovery.title: Recovery
recovery.text: You can enter one of your recovery codes in case you lost access to your mobile device.

password-restore.title: Restore password
password-restore.resend-email-alert-message: Information has been re-sent to your email address.

forgot-password.text: Just enter the email address you've used to create your account.

validators.password-is-short: Password must be at least {{count}} characters.

email-pending.text-section-1: If a user with this email address exists, we sent an email with a link to reset your password.
email-pending.text-section-2: Please check your inbox for a confirmation email. Click the link in the email to create a new password.
email-pending.text-section-3: If you didn't receive the email, please check your spam folder. Or recheck the email you specified for the password reset.

email-confirm.title: Email confirm
email-confirm.error-during-confirmation: An error occurred during the confirmation of email:
